title: ATHLETIC COMMISSION – Amends existing law to provide an exemption from certain duties of the state athletic commission for fundraising events held by charitable organizations.
subject: ATHLETICS
CHARITIES
COMMISSIONS
GOVERNMENT

actions.description: Introduced, read first time, referred to JRA for Printing
Reported Printed and Referred to Business
Reported out of Committee with Do Pass Recommendation, Filed for Second Reading
Read second time; Filed for Third Reading
U.C. to hold place on third reading calendar until Monday, February 17, 2025

Read Third Time in Full – PASSED - 62-7-1AYES – Alfieri, Andrus, Barbieri, Beiswenger, Boyle, Bruce, Burgoyne, Cannon, Cayler, Cheatum, Clow, Cornilles, Crane(12), Crane(13), Dygert, Ehardt, Ehlers, Erickson, Fuhriman, Furniss, Galaviz, Garner, Handy, Harris, Hawkins, Healey, Hill(Hill), Holtzclaw, Horman, Hostetler, Leavitt, Manwaring, Marmon, Mathias, McCann, Mendive, Miller, Mitchell, Monks, Nelsen, Palmer, Petzke, Pickett, Pohanka, Price, Rasor, Raybould, Raymond, Redman, Sauter, Scott, Shepherd, Shirts, Skaug, Tanner(13), Tanner(14), Thompson, Vander Woude, Weber, Wheeler, Wisniewski, Mr. SpeakerNAYS – Achilles, Berch, Church, Egbert, Gannon, Green, RubelAbsent – MickelsenFloor Sponsor - BeiswengerTitle apvd - to Senate
Received from the House passed; filed for first reading
Introduced, read first time; referred to: State Affairs
Reported out of committee; to 14th Order for amendment
Placed in the Committee of the Whole
Reported out as amended; filed for first reading
Read first time as amended in the Senate; Filed for Second Reading
Read second time as amended in the Senate, filed for Third Reading

Read third time as amended in the Senate – FAILED - 14-21-0AYES – Adams, Blaylock, Foreman, Galloway, Keyser, Kohl, Lenney, Markley(Carlson), Nichols, Okuniewicz, Shippy, Toews, Zito, ZuiderveldNAYS – Anthon, Bernt, Bjerke, Burtenshaw, Cook, Den Hartog, Goodrich(Rabe), Grow, Guthrie, Harris, Hart, Lakey, Lent, Ricks, Ruchti, Semmelroth, Taylor, VanOrden, Ward-Engelking, Wintrow, WoodwardAbsent and excused – NoneFloor Sponsor - ZitoRet’d to House
Returned from Senate Failed; Filed in the office of the Chief Clerk
